FuncDef:
The cir simple-test enable command enables the simple CIR test for NQA test flows.
The undo cir simple-test enable command disables the simple CIR test for NQA test flows.
By default, the step CIR test is enabled for NQA test flows.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Either of the following tests can be selected in an Ethernet service activation test:
Simple CIR test: The test speed is rapid, and the test time is short.Step CIR test: It provides more accurate network status analysis, whereas the test time is longer than that a simple CIR test takes.
